page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content:
There is only one school in the block, Lyneal C.E. Primary which is a small Victorian one with 31 pupils split into 2 classes taught by Mr.J. Hartley and Miss E. Williams. The other staff are Mrs.B. Egerton(dinners assistant and auxillary help) and Mrs.O. Crump (caretaker).
The school operates an integrated day and places emphasis on a thematic, direct experience approach.
As well as the traditional subjects which take up a large proportion of the day, the pupils can also: swim(at Ellesmere), learn violin, guitar or recorder, do art, drama, woodwork, build models, do some creative dance, do science work, play games and do P.E. as well as work with the computer!
